---
title: Add a virtual IBAN
---

# Add a virtual IBAN

Add a virtual IBAN with the API.

## Guide {#guide}

1. Call the `addVirtualIbanEntry` mutation.
1. Enter the account ID for which you'd like to add a virtual IBAN.
1. Add the success payload, including any information you'd like to review.
1. Add rejections (not shown).

## Mutation {#mutation}

ðŸ”Ž [Open the mutation in API Explorer](https://explorer.swan.io?%3D%3D&tab=api)

```graphql {2} showLineNumbers
mutation AddVirtual {
  addVirtualIbanEntry(input: { accountId: "$YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID" }) {
    ... on AddVirtualIbanEntrySuccessPayload {
      __typename
      virtualIbanEntry {
        IBAN
        BIC
        id
        label
        status
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Payload {#payload}

The payload shows provides the virtual IBAN with the status `Enabled`.

```json {6,10} showLineNumbers
{
  "data": {
    "addVirtualIbanEntry": {
      "__typename": "AddVirtualIbanEntrySuccessPayload",
      "virtualIbanEntry": {
        "IBAN": "FR7617328899000000000000000",
        "BIC": "SWNBFR22",
        "id": "$YOUR_VIRTUAL_IBAN_ID",
        "label": "Virtual",
        "status": "Enabled"
      }
    }
  }
}
```
